skin.screen: #To reduce debug noise. #To reduce debug noise. #To reduce debug noise. #To reduce debug noise.

screen.name: MessageBoxSimple
screen.title: Message
screen.applet:
from enigma import eSize, ePoint if self.timerRunning: titleheight = 30 else: titleheight = 0 self.setTitle("") orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgheight = self.instance.size().height() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + 76, textsize[1] + 30) wsizex = textsize[0] + 140 if (75 + textsize[1]) > 180: wsizey = textsize[1] else: wsizey = textsize[1] + 38 lenlist = len(self.list)*38 if (lenlist > 320): lenlist = 320
wsizey += lenlist + 20
if (420 > wsizex): wsizex = 420 listwidth = self.getListWidth() + 10 if (listwidth > 1280): listwidth = 1280 if (listwidth > wsizex): wsizex = listwidth wsize = (wsizex, wsizey + titleheight) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self["text"].instance.move(ePoint(97, 12 + titleheight)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: listsize = (wsizex-10, lenlist) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(3, int(wsizey - lenlist + titleheight - 3))) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(int(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth) // 2), int(orgpos.y() + (orgheight - wsizey) // 2)))
